Key Match Events: Orbelin Pineda scored the first goal for Mexico in less than 5 minutes
Cesar Huerta doubled the lead early in the second half
Luis Romo scored the third goal for Mexico
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at the Rose Bowl
Mexico was without Guillermo Ochoa, Edson Álvarez, Raúl Jiménez, and Hirving Lozano
Others: Santiago Gimenez had another night to forget for the national side as his goal drought continued
New Zealand's defence managed to keep Mexico tame despite El Tri dominating the match with 13 shots to two
